meanings.sent1: The ortolan chirped happily in the tree.
meanings.sent2: I spotted an ortolan flying gracefully in the sky.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ortolan refuse to share its perch? Because it was a little birdy!
meanings.sent4: The ortolan's song was a sweet melody in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The colorful feathers of the ortolan brightened up the meadow.

meanings.definition: A delicacy consisting of a small bird, typically a bunting, that is eaten whole.
meanings.sent1: The chef prepared the ortolan for a special feast.
meanings.sent2: Eating an ortolan is a unique culinary experience.
meanings.sent3: Why did the ortolan bring a suitcase to the dinner table? It wanted to pack itself for a trip!
meanings.sent4: The ortolan dish was a symphony of flavors in my mouth.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the roasted ortolan filled the room with delight.
